sectionLinks.title: Zoo Veterinarian
sectionLinks.description: Animal Lovers will enjoy this magazine which is compiled by a Veterinarian in Zoo practice. These topics are of interest to all but are the regular reading of a veterinarian practicing wild and exotic animal veterinary medicine.  This reading list includes wildlife medicine and surgery, general veterinary topics including husbandry, enrichment, medicine, surgery and nutrition. Conservation around the world and the pressures on habitats and the animals in those habitats. Ecotourism, photography and blogging in all those areas. Professional, popular and extremist points of view are surveyed.
